member.name: POLICY_NOTIFICATION_INFORMATION_CLASS
member.summary: The POLICY_NOTIFICATION_INFORMATION_CLASS enumeration defines the types of policy information and policy domain information for which your application can request notification of changes.

member.name: POLICY_NOTIFICATION_INFORMATION_CLASS.PolicyNotifyAuditEventsInformation
member.summary: Notify when any of the audited categories are changed.

member.name: POLICY_NOTIFICATION_INFORMATION_CLASS.PolicyNotifyAccountDomainInformation
member.summary: Notify when the account domain information changes.

member.name: POLICY_NOTIFICATION_INFORMATION_CLASS.PolicyNotifyServerRoleInformation
member.summary: Notify when the LSA server changes its role from primary to backup, or vice versa.

member.name: POLICY_NOTIFICATION_INFORMATION_CLASS.PolicyNotifyDnsDomainInformation
member.summary: Notify when the DNS domain information changes or if the primary domain information changes.

member.name: POLICY_NOTIFICATION_INFORMATION_CLASS.PolicyNotifyDomainEfsInformation
member.summary: Notify when the Encrypting File System (EFS) domain information changes.

member.name: POLICY_NOTIFICATION_INFORMATION_CLASS.PolicyNotifyDomainKerberosTicketInformation
member.summary: Notify when the Kerberos ticket for the domain changes.

member.name: POLICY_NOTIFICATION_INFORMATION_CLASS.PolicyNotifyMachineAccountPasswordInformation
member.summary: Notify when the machine account password changes.
